contact_info_p1: If you have an offer or a job for me, then you can use the suggested communication methods below. I will try to respond to your message or letter within two to three days, of course, if it is not a weekend.
contact_info_p2: Please, note that **I really prefer Telegram or Discord for any further discussions**.
index_paragraph_1:
I am a developer and I write code because I like it.

I specialize in Web Application Development: Python, NodeJS. In my spare time I write plugins for Minecraft servers in Kotlin and/or Java.
index_paragraph_2: Most likely you do not know me, so you can check out my projects. I made a selection of my most significant projects in a special section on this site. Of course, you can also explore my GitHub account - I try to make most of my projects open-sourced. I belive that open-sourced projects are extremely important for everyone.
